text: Lekeni mwemwe tsambokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kulawa kwa Kiristu. Na Ghumuhe koghendelela kukala mghati mwenu, apfo ng'ambama imunu wowose yawalangulitse. Kwaapfila Ghumuhe wake kowalangulitsani chila chinu, na ghamalangulitso ghake gha kweli, si gha ughutsu bae. Lelo mghakinde ghamalangulitso gha Ghumuhe na mwilunge na Kiristu.
